text: İhlas News Agency (; IHA) is a Turkish news agency which was founded in 1993, and headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. At its founding, it was Turkey's first private news agency, as well as the first to provide news through the medium of video. It is part of the Turkish conglomerate İhlas Holding. ==References== ==External links== *Company website Category:Mass media companies established in 1993 Category:Companies based in Istanbul Category:News agencies based in Turkey
title: İhlas News Agency
